summary: Anything other than “number go up” is just noise.
title: Crypto Is About To Reach the Banana Zone Regardless of Global Turmoil.
detailed_content: I read a quote recently that said, “Never mid-curve life”.It referred to the I.Q. bell curve, where the average person in the middle tends to overcomplicate things to sound smart or get lost in unnecessary detail.
author: Jayden Levitt
